name: Cyphermunk House
description:
Its Nostr night at Cyphermunk House.
üìÖ Tuesday 30 Aug, 6pm
üìç 9 Northington Street, WC1N 2JF
Welcome plebs to Cyphermunk House ‚Äì combining education, art and culture to create signal for bitcoin and nostr.
This is the first social nostr night at the UK‚Äôs only bitcoin art gallery. Although predominantly a social event, beginner questions on bitcoin and nostr will be fielded by our team of educators.
Freedom tech for sale includes;
‚Äì Start 9 nodes

Please do not take photos of unconsenting adults and please do not shitcoin. Violators will be thrown into our $5 wrench security simulation.

name: Bitcoin & Beers ‚Äì Gloucestershire
description:
Come hang out with fellow Bitcoin enthusiasts and learn how to make a real-time purchase with bitcoin. Bitcoin and Beer are provided.
Join us for an evening of Bitcoin and Beers where we educate and empower entrepreneurs by showcasing the practical uses of bitcoin and other digital currencies in everyday transactions. Attendees will learn the fundamentals of bitcoin, including its operational mechanics, benefits, and potential impacts on their businesses.
To enhance the experience, participants will receive a small amount of bitcoin to make real-time purchases, such as buying beers, allowing them to directly engage with and understand the technology, thereby gaining hands-on experience with bitcoin transactions.
This hands-on approach demystifies bitcoin and provides a unique networking opportunity among local business leaders.
Co-hosted by Myna Accountants CEO, Joe David, and BTCGlos Exec, Matthew Bax, the event not only aims to educate but also to foster networking among local business owners, creating a supportive community of forward-thinking professionals eager to embrace new financial technologies. Registration is required, and admission is free, making it an accessible and valuable event for all local entrepreneurs interested in the future of digital payments.

name: BitDevs ‚Äì London
description: Doors will open at 18:45 and the event will start at 19:00, so attendees are advised to arrive on time. If anyone arrives late, they should message the organizers on Meetup, and the organizers will do their best to accommodate them, but cannot provide any guarantees. The venue is located near Westminster, and the exact location will be shared via Meetup with all attendees. Attendees should double-check their notification settings to ensure they receive updates.

name: Belfast Bitcoin
description:
A social gathering of fellow & would-be Bitcoiners interested in learning about and sharing their experience with Bitcoin.
They meet in person monthly on the first Tuesday of each month at Ormeau Baths Event Space, 18 Ormeau Avenue, Belfast, BT2 8HS, Northern Ireland.
There‚Äôs an active Telegram group and forum, see links below for further details.
They have a great website with loads of info on it.
